Articles.Content:
Not sure where this thread goes category wise, so i'll put it here.

Anyways, i decided to search up that "What did you do in ksp today?" Thread. You know, the biggest thread in the entire forums.

So i typed in "what did you do in ksp today" into the search bar.

The thread wasn't even on the first page of results.

Logic? LOGIIC! Come back logic! I love you!

Just a little observation

>Advanced search

>Search titles only

It is the first one that pops up

Also, if I had to guess where this thread would go, maybe The Space Lounge since it is not directly pertaining to KSP.

Hope I could help
Actually the Kerbal Network with a Forum tag, seeing as it's about the forum

Advanced Search is your friend. You can search specific subforums, or for posts by a specific user, or titles only (useful in finding mod threads).

"What did you do in ksp today?" is tough for a search engine because all the words in it get used quite frequently here.
